text: Cun ʙo kofiron rūʙarū şuded, gardanaşonro ʙizaned. Va cun onhoro saxt furū kūfted, asiraşon kuned va saxt ʙiʙanded. On goh jo ʙa minnat ozod kumed jo ʙa fidja (ʙa ivazi pul). To on goh, ki çang ʙa pojon ojad. Va in ast hukmi Xudo. Va agar Xudo mexost, az onon intiqom megirift, vale xost to şumoro ʙa jakdigar ʙijozmojad. Va onon, ki dar rohi Xudo kuşta şudaand, amalhojaşonro ʙotil namekunad
